p: In contrast, frost rings in position 2 reflect cold events in spring after growth has been initiated. Here, we found the strongest climate relationships to be with spring temperature accumulation and the start of the growing season (Supplementary Table 7). As an example, the year 1992 had a high proportion of frost rings in position 2, and a false spring: an unusually early warm spell in April before day 100 (Fig. 1f).
